## Data check
```{r}
data <- read.csv("data/data_student.csv")
summary(data)
```
## Tidyverse library
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

# Descriptives Statistics
```{r}
data %>% # "tibble" = tableau
  summarise_if(is.numeric, list(
    mean = mean,
    sd = sd,
    median = median,
    min = min,
    max = max
  ), na.rm = TRUE)
  
```
